page.title: 07Greenacres cont.
page.content: ...house,the countryside and because of employment. The changes were the new road, {Melbury},{Barrat} and {Delany} estates.These were all built as the bus routes,the school and the Golf Village surrounded the area. Overall,it was found quite expensive to live in the area. The older generation have seen many changes. No more than 50 years ago a cinder track ran past the house,the water was fetched from a farmhouse 50m up the track.There was no electricity, gas, or telephones.The country area was liked because it was quiet and fairly near to the town.The noise from the motorway was unpopular,but as they say "{Times have changed.}"
